website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line model that's built to last and tackle numerous jobs. If you want the best in power and performance, this is the one to pick.
pros: Low-profile design works in tight areas
From a top manufacturer in power tools
Wrench, carrying case, and 3-yr. warranty included
cons: Though the build is rugged, it's a bit awkward for individuals with small hands
Some users feel the power trigger is a bit too close to the grinder wheel

customer_reviews.title: Wow.  Beat my high expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Mind bending quality and power. I bought this because we had a concrete sidewalk installed and the contractor got concrete into the window frame of a basement window. The only solution I could think of was to cut a straight line where the window used to be. I thought I'd be at it four hours, but this tool cut a dead straight line through the concrete in about 15 minutes. Bought an extra blade thinking I'd need it, but the one blade did the job without showing any sign of wear. Very impressed. I have other DeWalt tools and their quality is excellent, but this really exceeded my expectations especially based on the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: 11-Amp Angle Grinder - Dewalt DWE402K
customer_reviews.text: Great Product - No issues so far - Used to sharpen my lawnmower blades Grinder came with case and wrench The picture I have attached shows the unthreaded backing flange and the threaded locking flange which come with the angle grinder. Instructions advised to take both of these off for the grinding disks that I bought (Dewalt DW4523) (The 2 grinding disks pictured DO NOT come with the kit) No other adapters comes with this angle grinder.
customer_reviews.author: JOE K

customer_reviews.title: Nice little beast!!!
customer_reviews.text: DWE402k: So far so good!!! For anyone wondering the grinder model that comes in this is the DWE402 that has no ground on plug, does have the "lock on" button even though the picture shows the DWE402n (no "lock on" button on the side). I like the guard mechanism that let's you adjust it to multiple positions. Most reasons I took the guards off was how much work it took to adjust the position if the guard. This makes it simple to do with no tools in seconds. Time will tell on longevity and will update if my view changes.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Overheat at All!
customer_reviews.text: Got a Makita first, but that one burned up on me quickly. Got this one as a replacement, but it quickly stopped for no obvious reason. Had it replaced under warranty and the replacment has been humming! They've really figured out how to keep this thing cool. I had it going last night for more than an hour sanding concrete walls, and it never even got warm. For what it's worth, I only use DeWalt accessories figuring if they make it for it, it's probably appropriate. I'm mentioning that because there are some weird accessories out there that I would not feel comfortable putting on a quick-spinning device such as this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: No spanner wrench- resold returned item-poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The grinder came with an allen wrench which fits nothing. It should have contained a spanner wrench to tighten the grinding wheel head instead. Once a grinding wheel is installed, it will not fit back inside the carry case. I had to cut out areas to make it fit. The package appeared to have been opened and returned for the reasons stated above and then resold. However, the grinder itself does run well.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor J  Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cutting Pavers and Retaining Wall Blocks
customer_reviews.text: This thing packs quite a punch. It's powerful and easy to use, and the lock-on function is helpful. One thing i don't like is that the case is big enough for the grinder...and that's about it. It's a chore to squeeze a few blades into it, too. And, speaking of blades, I highly recommend the OCR 4" Concrete Turbo Diamond Grinding Cup Wheel if you're working with masonry.
customer_reviews.author: The Infectious Lerp

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic small grinder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grinder for a gift for my son. I had purchased one for myself years ago and have used it many things over the years (grinding metal and concrete, cutting metal, buffing, polishing etc...). When my son needed to cut off some bolts I let him borrow my grinder. It soon was at his house more than mine...so I bought him one for Christmas . Now I can find my grinder in my own garage again!
customer_reviews.author: Gardening Gal

customer_reviews.title: The tool is great - 5 starts - but the package deal with the box totally sucks - waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy the package with the BOX. The box is designed to only fit the tool - and just barely. I picked up a Type 1 guard and some other parts - I'll definitely need a different box. I guess I can use this box for my sander. Not sure why they make the box so tight and confirming to the tool - would be nice to have a functional box for all the many parts you will need for using this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Tamil

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for quite a while now and have never used except to make sure it works. But I like anything Dewalt and I collect tools. But I'm sure it will be like the rest of my Dewalt tools , quality, I have nothing from Dewalt that I dont like and they usually always do a good job so this shouldn't be any different.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool / Carrying Case a Waist of Money / Lower Stars Because of Case
customer_reviews.text: Tool is 5 stars. Case is ZERO stars. Purchased tool with case. Unfortunately, the last time I bought tools with case, was 18 years ago. Those were Milwaukee tools with stellar metal cases with strong latches. Dewalt offers a flimsy plastic case too small for the tool to properly fit, with thin metal stamped metal latches. Also, you cannot put the tool with 4 1/2 disk in the box. Save your money and do not buy the case. The case is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Poz

customer_reviews.title: Grinder without wheels
customer_reviews.text: Received grinder. Looks used. No lanyard, no grinding wheel. Not much use to me without the wheels. No indication that the wheels were accessories until I read the instructions. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: Used it today.
customer_reviews.text: I had my mower deck off my lawn tractor today for some repair work. I used the down time to sharpen the blades. I used my dewalt grinder to do that. used a flapper sanding disc and got the job done in no time. I own two of these. theyu work great.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt is top quality, reliable and long-lasting equipment!
customer_reviews.text: DeWalt makes the best electric tool available! I own four of their tools. They are top quality, strong, and reliable. I used my DeWalt reciprocating saw to reduced a 6-ft triple-trunk tree to 22 inches tall. It is now a bonsai tree. I used the die grinder to style the tops of the three trunks. The variable speed is a great feature!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H.

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt grinder 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing! I need it for one project in the house, and now I'm kicking myself for not having it sooner . Just so completely useful for so many things. I am still on my original cutting wheel, and I have cut through faucets, small boat anchors, trailer bolts, anything. Very happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Yankees27

customer_reviews.title: Power, comfort, and safety
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied, lots of torque and comfortable to hold. Take a bit of conscious thought to operate trigger, but I appreciate not accidentally pressing the switch while crawling around underneath my truck. I bought the optional type 1 guard and changing the guards and blade is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Misky

customer_reviews.title: Hard working and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to clean up after a welding project. It gave me no trouble at all, and I have no complaints. It ground through mild steel without a complaint. I got the model that came with a carrying case and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Falk

customer_reviews.title: This thing is FUN! BrrrrEEEEEEEEEEAAA
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of a 7-amp angle grinder, since the price wasn't really that much different. This thing is FUN! BrrrrEEEEEEEEEEAAA!!! BrrEEEEEAAA! Gets the job done. Make sure you buy moderately nice disc for whatever job you're doing. There are extra thin (1-2mm) discs for cutting metal that I used to cut some metal fencing, and I can't imagine having to do it with a thicker disc. Totally awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Rymarz

customer_reviews.title: Loud and in charge
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as expected. Have used to cut dozens of steel rods and it has held up just fine. I mainly use it for hobbies and small builds, so can not comment on it's abilities if used at a higher duty cycle. Oh, and it's hella loud. Be careful about using indoors in your apartment if you have any neighbors at all... :)
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hritz

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight beast
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's a Dewalt, so... Great stuff. It's pretty heavy, weight wise, but heavy duty for sure.
customer_reviews.author: E.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder with a case!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have wanted an angle grinder for a while now, and our concrete sidewalk project helped make it so. Highly recommend, especially since it comes with a case. The way I figure... The best way to keep your tools clean is to put them in the case before you store them away!
customer_reviews.author: Cider Press BBQ

customer_reviews.title: Strong Quality Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Have used the grinder a couple of times. Great power and quality materials. Value for the money is ok.
customer_reviews.author: jmopr83

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Now he doesn’t have to use mine. Great for his welding projects.
customer_reviews.author: 77petals

customer_reviews.title: Works Great USA Made
customer_reviews.text: Terrific grinder strong and easy to use. Used Dewalt brand cutting wheels to cut through a good bit of wrought iron. Had power to spare
customer_reviews.author: William Burkard

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I really like the tool but since I bought it, i have found other places that sell it for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Smith

customer_reviews.title: A good tool is a pleasure to use!
customer_reviews.text: As my cheap tools burn up and wear out I am trying to replace them with quality tools. Buy nice or buy twice is a lesson I've learned the hard way. This grinder is a quality tool and a pleasure to use. I'm just a hobbyist... So I don't use it every day..... But it's actually a pleasure to use and I look forward to projects where I get to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy-C

customer_reviews.title: saftey
customer_reviews.text: I like this angle grinder for that paddle because if you drop it, it shuts off right away does not stay running like the ones with the switch
customer_reviews.author: TDS

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, solidly-built grinder. The case is great, and the wheels are easy to change out. I used it to cut a lock, and it performed beautifully. Feels like it's built to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bitzer

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for the collection
customer_reviews.text: Another good Dewalt tool to my collection. It made quick work of cleaning up a rusted trailer hitch with a with a wire wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Clay R Burton

customer_reviews.title: One serious grinder
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! The hard case is a big plus. It even has room for storing a few wheels inside. This thing has loads of power!
customer_reviews.author: Synikal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice saw, high quality, well worth the money to add the storage case. Where else would you put it, protected?
customer_reviews.author: Dan e Morell

customer_reviews.title: Step Down to what you need.
customer_reviews.text: I use grinders from time to time where I work and figured most grinders are the same. I bought this to do some minor metal work. This is probably to much grinder generally speaking, it has a lot of power and torque I could have bought the small grinder and been just as happy. Overall the product seems solid.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cutter!
customer_reviews.text: I used this angle grinder to cut 1/8" angle iron. It cut through it like butter and did not bog down. Great for cutting steel!
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Nice grinder
customer_reviews.text: My last grinder was a cheapie, it seized on the disk. This ought to last a bit longer!
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Weber

customer_reviews.title: quality built angle grinder, enough power and good form factor
customer_reviews.text: It has the power to get the grinding done. Quality build and all mechanisms are straightforward to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lazlo Diozsak

customer_reviews.title: Good First Impression
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once but it has worked well. I sharpened brush hog blades without trouble. Time will tell if it holds up to being used on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: R. CushmanTop Contributor: Magic: The Gathering

customer_reviews.title: Solid feel, excellant storage case...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to bring to a friend in Aruba. Unit had a solid feel to it and came stored in a plastic case. He was like a little kid on Christmas morning when I gave it to him. He constructs iron fencing for a living. Will report back on his finding upon my next visit to the Island. Mi Stima Aruba... (I love Aruba)
customer_reviews.author: Raymo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Reliable Angle Grinder
customer_reviews.text: This piece of equipment works as expected to do the toughest jobs. Very reliable and strong. Good Product.
customer_reviews.author: Rockbless

customer_reviews.title: Great took
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a beast! Best angle grinder I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce CARPENTER

customer_reviews.title: Fast easy grinding
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought a long time ago. Used to sharpen tractor blades. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: tcraftman

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Successfully widened a opening in a island for a new stove. with the diamond blade it easily cut the granite tile and cement.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N Whittemore

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: It works well. No problems. Quality and a good price!
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Demoed all the tile in a bathroom with this. ...
customer_reviews.text: Demoed all the tile in a bathroom with this. Works well. I'd buy another but there is nothing wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: JFWNPB

customer_reviews.title: Great design, high quality, power to spare
customer_reviews.text: The design engineering behind it is ingenious and the quality is as good or better than any grinder I've used. It's a very solid tool and a real joy to use. More power than you'll ever need from a grinder but it's extremely manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Sodbuster

customer_reviews.title: This grinder is awesome everything I put it to the test it works ...
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is awesome everything I put it to the test it works really well and very strong I would recommend this to anyone that does a lot of welding need to grind or cut stuff off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a small grinder before, but needed one to get rid of a very small tree trunk. This DeWalt 4 1/2" grinder worked perfectly, although its rather shallow depth of cut simply meant that I needed more time to go back and forth over the stump to finally get it below ground level. It's a very handy tool to have in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: John Holcombe

customer_reviews.title: What you'd expect from DeWalt
customer_reviews.text: Solid grinder, bought another to avoid having to swap wheels as often, haven't had any complaints with the metal work and bit of masonry I've done.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin and Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is one of the best tools I've purchased. I used a Harbor Freight Drill Master type and that went out within a couple of days. This Dewalt Grinder is heavy duty and it runs for days.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Sibayan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with the right blades! I cut into granite countertop like if it was butter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Trigger is not that comfortable but other then that it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the Dewalt 402K Grinder Kit.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably an overkill for the amount I will use this grinder, but I wanted a product that will get the job (large or small) done without any problems. So far, it has performed much better than the other less expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Old Gray Duck

customer_reviews.title: What can I say - it's DeWalt!  great quality and @ 11amps....much more power than the competition
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - it's DeWalt! great quality and @ 11amps....much more power than the competition
customer_reviews.author: R!CK

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and good price.
customer_reviews.text: As discribed good product. Grinding and cutting has been easy with this grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan hawaii tested

customer_reviews.title: Just the Right Size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to sharpen the blades on my brush hog mower. Clearance is tight under that machine and this was just the right size to get to the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Quality, as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Tough, sturdy grinder. To clarify; the paddle CAN be locked in the ‘ON’ position with the small black button shown in the photo. For the patriots: it’s made in the USA, so is obviously better than everything else made anywhere else in the world. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: SukiMonster

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, unrelenting, smooth, steady, balanced - what's not to like!
customer_reviews.author: MD Gidding

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So powerful and well built 3 years later it's still ticking as new
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I had to do some reno in a bathroom that required grinding down some tile and thin set to get a proper fit. The grinder was the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: James Braun

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Liked this very angle grinder but did return it as I found it to be a little heavy for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Husband is happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Husband is happy with this. Using it to cut bolts, clear rust spots on vehicles, etc. He hasn't complained about it yet.
customer_reviews.author: wrathe

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product for the price. No issues, I've used it to cut ceramic tile to smoothing a cast iron pan
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great power
customer_reviews.text: You will need back plate to use fiber disk , for fine grinding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt is the best
customer_reviews.text: What's a good grinder has a lot of power just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: K Joos

customer_reviews.title: Great Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grinder, typical Dewalt quality Far Far better than Milwaukee, Bosch Ryobi Ect Ect.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love dewalt and this tool is no exception. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Mussatto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has performed well for the few times I have used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with performance so far. The case is plastic and quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeniy Butmerchuk

customer_reviews.title: Well made - Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool as expected from Dewalt; shipping by Amazon very quick (via Amazon Prime)
customer_reviews.author: River Person

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for wood working projects especially for carving out bowls, and boards. I made a pohaku kui ai (poi pounding board) and it turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and dedication.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great tool. I use it for construction work.
customer_reviews.author: Shone D.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Major power. Havent used it long but have been impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Watch out for the kick when you power it up. This tool has a lot of power.
customer_reviews.author: G. Benn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great grinder, very powefull and made in the USA. Nice carry box too.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: The guard is lose and won't stay on. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The guard is lose and won't stay on. I had the but a new grinder because at work I have to have the guard on at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: Great design improvements on an already great product
customer_reviews.text: Great design improvements on an already great product. New quick release guard is awesome. As one review mentioned, don't compare this to a industrial grinder at twice the price, because that it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Roberson

customer_reviews.title: So far, I'm getting my money's worth.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I like it so far, first one that i ever bought. Only negative is that it's a hard start. But besides that. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: More than enough power.
customer_reviews.text: This thing will take your leg off if you are not careful. I learned the hard way, Was wire brushing some rust off and got caught on an edge and wham, grinded my leg into a nice soft tissue wound. So, be careful! That is not a slant on this product, it rocks. Just be careful using it as it is powerful as an ox.
customer_reviews.author: David Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Makes quick work of exhaust pipes. The tool appears to be very well made and has plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good idea bad execution!
customer_reviews.text: I got my angle grinder yesterday, 2 day shipping was great. BUT tell me how I’m suppose to change blade/grinders with the alane wrench when obviously this unit needs the tool. Great idea but put the right parts together!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hill

customer_reviews.title: The trigger safety is a little awkward but other than that it's a very good
customer_reviews.text: Very high speed grinder . The trigger safety is a little awkward but other than that it's a very good tool
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts...
customer_reviews.text: Box came with seal in place, but was missing the handle that attaches to the grinder... I'm surprised as i here never had something like this happened before...
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Came with an Allen wrench instead of the correct tool change and tighten the blades.
customer_reviews.text: Came with a useless Allen wrench instead of the correct tool change and tighten the blades. I would say that it was shipped incomplete.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G.

customer_reviews.title: Tough to figure out which guard to use to cut ...
customer_reviews.text: Tough to figure out which guard to use to cut. Not clear in ad that it doesn't have it included and you have to buy it as an accessory. A little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schlinger

customer_reviews.title: Grinding wheels not included, good Dewalt quality product nevertheless
customer_reviews.text: The grinding wheels don NOT come with this unit, although pictured.
customer_reviews.author: stan

customer_reviews.title: I do like the paddle switch compared to the slide switch my ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this grinder a few times already to cut some bolts and to do some sanding. Well all went very well. This is my second 4 1/2 inch grinder and it works very well. I do like the paddle switch compared to the slide switch my last grinder had. It is more convenient to use. The power is great and the balance of the tools is right on. The adjustable guard is a nice touch also. Good tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ray J

product_meta.title: DEWALT Angle Grinder Tool, 4-1/2-Inch, 11-Amp (DWE402K)
product_meta.description: Style:With Kit Box| Pattern Name:Angle Grinder ToolThe DEWALT DWE402K 4-1/2" 11amp Angle Grinder Paddle Kit features an 11 Amp AC/DC 11,000 RPM motor that is designed for faster material removal and higher overload protection. A Dust Ejection System provides durability by ejecting damaging dust and debris particles that enter the tool through the air intake vents. It has a low profile gear case which allows access into tight spaces, and a Quick-Change wheel release which allows tool free wheel removal without the need for a wrench. This grinder also has a One-Touch Guard that offers 360 degree rotation of the guard in a single action. A paddle switch with safety lock-off prevents accidental start up, and the matching wheel flanges allow the use of common accessories. Includes: Grinder, One-Touch Guard, 2-Position Side Handle, Wrench, Kit Box.
feature_bullets: 11 Amp AC/DC 11,000 RPM motor that is designed for faster material removal
Dust ejection system keeps out damaging dust and debris particles
Low-profile gear case which allows access into tight spaces
One-Touch Guard that offers 360-degree rotation of the guard
A paddle switch with safety lock-off prevents accidental start-up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars294 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
